import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-admin-menu', templateUrl: './admin-menu.component.html', styleUrls: ['./admin-menu.component.css'] }) export class AdminMenuComponent { constructor(private router:Router){} logout() { localStorage.removeItem('user'); localStorage.removeItem('role'); this.router.navigateByUrl(''); } } Document
